players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Oh no, Alice is gone! We need to be careful and figure this out together."
Diana: "I believe Charlie is the mafioso. We should vote for them to protect the town."
You: "I think we need more discussion before voting. Diana, why do you suspect Charlie specifically?"
Charlie: "Diana, you're quick to accuse without evidence. Bob is right, we need more discussion. Why are you pushing so hard for my arrest?"
You: "I think Diana is being too aggressive with her accusation. Charlie is right to ask for evidence. We should consider all possibilities before voting."
Diana: "I have evidence that Charlie is the mafioso. We need to vote them out to protect the town!"
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Charlie

You killed Alice.

Day 1 begins.
You: "Oh no, Alice is gone! We need to be careful and figure this out together."
Diana: "I believe Charlie is the mafioso. We should vote for them to protect the town."
Bob: "I think we need more discussion before voting. Diana, why do you suspect Charlie specifically?"
You: "Diana, you're quick to accuse without evidence. Bob is right, we need more discussion. Why are you pushing so hard for my arrest?"
Bob: "I think Diana is being too aggressive with her accusation. Charlie is right to ask for evidence. We should consider all possibilities before voting."
Diana: "I have evidence that Charlie is the mafioso. We need to vote them out to protect the town!"

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Oh no, Alice is gone! We need to be careful and figure this out together."
You: "I believe Charlie is the mafioso. We should vote for them to protect the town."
Bob: "I think we need more discussion before voting. Diana, why do you suspect Charlie specifically?"
Charlie: "Diana, you're quick to accuse without evidence. Bob is right, we need more discussion. Why are you pushing so hard for my arrest?"
Bob: "I think Diana is being too aggressive with her accusation. Charlie is right to ask for evidence. We should consider all possibilities before voting."
You: "I have evidence that Charlie is the mafioso. We need to vote them out to protect the town!"
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
